Content.Text:
<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, <MYNAME>. Up and at 'em, it's a
brand new day!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I checked the fields this morning, I saw
some turnips ready to be picked.
<PAGE>
Today I'm gonna teach you how to harvest
crops.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come, let's head out to the field.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, let's see you pick these turnips, dear.
<PAGE>
To harvest crops, stand next to them and <BLUE>press
the A Button</BLUE> to gather the crops into a basket.
<PAGE>
<BLUE>Press the A Button again</BLUE> to pick up the basket
and harvest the whole crop at once.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Once you've harvested these turnips, come talk
to me. Good luck, dear!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Stand next to a harvestable crop and <BLUE>press the A
Button</BLUE> to gather it into a basket.
<PAGE>
<BLUE>Press the A Button again</BLUE> to pick up the basket
and harvest the whole crop at once.
<PAGE>
Once you've harvested these turnips, come talk
to me, okay?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My, my! I still see some turnips in the ground,
dear. Looks like you've got work to do.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well done, dearie. Do you understand how to
harvest crops now?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>This time you harvested the turnips by hand, but
you'll need a <BLUE>sickle</BLUE> to harvest some crops.
<PAGE>
I'll put some books with the details on your
bookshelf. Just take a look at it if you ever have
questions about harvesting.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well now, we've got a basket of delicious turnips
here, so why don't I make us a tasty lunch?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's go back to my house.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I made us a few different dishes using those
turnips you just harvested.
<PAGE>
We've got Turnip Salad, Turnip Soup and
Buttered Turnip.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Go on, dearie. Dig in! Dig in!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Did you like it? Oh, glad to hear you did. You've
got a healthy appetite!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Tomorrow, I'll show you how to take care of
livestock.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
But we're done for today.
<PAGE>
Since you have the rest of the day free, why not
go to town and visit some of the shops?
<PAGE>
Oh, yes! I forgot to mention this to you
yesterday, but...
<PAGE>
If there are items in your bag you use often,
select them and <BLUE>press the X Button</BLUE>
to <RED>register</RED> them.
<PAGE>
<RED>Registered</RED> items will appear on the third tab of
the Fast Access Menu.
<PAGE>
This way, you can quickly <BLUE>press the R Button</BLUE> to
equip your favorite items instead of having to
open your bag every time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Now here's your allowance for today. Go have
some fun, dear.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My, my! How'd you manage to fill your bag
already? Try organizing it to make room for the
turnips.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My, my! It seems your bag is full. I'll put the
tools into your toolbox, and the rest into your
storage.
